text:
Personally I’m interested in the software engineering side of Julia, and growing out that side of the community!

Love to see talks about others and how they use it in production environments

text: I don't think I can use Rust at my new job so probably no Rust from me. I also barely know the language so I wouldn't ever give a talk about it lol.

text: Affan what kind of stuff interests you? There's tons of cool stuff in the ODE world :slightly_smiling_face:.

elements.text: Affan what kind of stuff interests you? There's tons of cool stuff in the ODE world

text:
I don't know. I need an entry point to machine learning/ODE. I've seen some papers on combining the two fields, but havn't really looked into deeply.

For JuliaCon, I think I am going to port some common R packages from epidemiology.
